javascriptCode.name: New Javascript Code
javascriptCode.code: chart.at24hs.candle.open < chart.at24hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage + chart.at24hs.bollingerBand.deviation || chart.at24hs.candle.close < chart.at24hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage + chart.at24hs.bollingerBand.deviation

formula.name: New Formula
formula.code: "Take Position at rate " + candle.close + " " + quotedAsset + ". balanceBaseAsset = " + balanceBaseAsset + " " + baseAsset + "."

formula.name: New Formula
formula.code: if (chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage * 0.15 - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.deviation * 4 > 1){chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage * 0.15 - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.deviation * 4} else {takeProfit}

formula.name: New Formula
formula.code: if (chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage * 0.1 - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.deviation * 4 > 1){chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage * 0.1 - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.deviation * 4} else {takeProfit}
